import React from 'react'; import CompanyChartContainer from '../containers/CompanyChartContainer' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Tabs from 'react-bootstrap/Tabs'; import Tab from 'react-bootstrap/Tab'; import { store } from '../store' export function CompanyOverview(props) { return ( <> {props.name} Company Symbol: {props.symbol}
Industry: {props.industry}
Asset Type: {props.assetType}
Currency: {props.currency}
exchange: {props.exchange}
Country: {props.country}
Sector: {props.sector}
Address: {props.address}

Description: {props.description}
{' '} {props.name} {store.currentCompanySymbol && } ) }
